explains: adj. 改进的，补救的；治疗的，帮助康复的；补习的，辅导的
wordGroup: remedial action 补救行动，矫正措施
remedial measure n. 补救措施
remedial work 补救工作；修井作业；补课

sentences.en: Remedial action must be taken now.
Some authorities are now having to take remedial action.
sentences.cn: 一些当局现在不得不采取补救行动。

sentences.en: Efforts should be exerted on pollution prevention instead of on remedial measures.
sentences.cn: 应该努力防止污染，而不要采取补救措施。
